info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-mdt-stats-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for MDT statistics.
     Copyright (c) 2022 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Telemetry & Automation
**Paths:** 9

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-mdt-stats-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-mdt-stats-oper.yang)

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-mdt-stats-oper structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-mdt-stats-oper.html)

get.description: Statistics for a connection used by telemetry (collection)
Statistics for a connection used by telemetry
Statistics for a connection used by telemetry (collection)
Statistics for a connection used by telemetry

update-notifs-sent.description: The number of update notifications that were sent

update-notif-bytes-sent.description:
Number of bytes used by the update notifications
         that were sent. This will generally not include
         all of the protocol specific overhead.

update-notifs-dropped.description:
The number of update notifications that were
         dropped due to some error.
         Does not include dropped counts for specific
         reasons if/when they are introduced.

update-notifs-sent.description: The number of update notifications that were sent

update-notif-bytes-sent.description:
Number of bytes used by the update notifications
         that were sent. This will generally not include
         all of the protocol specific overhead.

update-notifs-dropped.description:
The number of update notifications that were
         dropped due to some error.
         Does not include dropped counts for specific
         reasons if/when they are introduced.

stats.description:
The statistics for the connection.
         Is the lifetime aggregate usage of the connection
         by all subscriptions.

sub-id.description:
Identifier of the subscription using the
         connection.
